dcterms:description: The Multi-Agent Particle-World Environment (MPE) is used for simulating multi-agent pursuit-evasion scenarios, allowing for the evaluation of cooperative strategies in a controlled environment.
dcterms:title: Multi-Agent Particle-World Environment (MPE)

dcterms:creator: B. Xu
F. Gao
C. Yu
R. Zhang
Y. Wu
Y. Wang
dcterms:description: The NVIDIA Isaac Sim-based Omnidrones Environment (Omni) provides a flexible platform for reinforcement learning in drone control, facilitating the study of multi-agent pursuit-evasion in a 3D space.
dcterms:title: NVIDIA Isaac Sim-based Omnidrones Environment (Omni)
